metadata.synopsis: In situations where Rugan survives after being beaten and tortured by the Zhentarim, players can interact with him in the chair he's tied to. He's exhausted, badly beaten, and barely capable of speaking full sentences.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - loadlevel WLD_Main;- goto 31.06, 44.73, 602.95;- kill gnolls;- talk to Rugan, take the cargo (through persuasion);- goto 273.49, 5.11, -273.83;- start combat with Zhents and use killcombat right after combat starts;- talk to Rugan

3.speaker: Rugan
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Character is tied to chair.NodeContext: badly beaten, eyes closed, barely conscious, expecting to be killed

1.speaker: Player
